name: blockchain-rat
description: Blockchain-based Remote Administration Tool using Polygon network

scripts.install-all: npm run install-contracts && npm run install-admin && npm run install-shared
scripts.build: npm run build-contracts && npm run build-admin
scripts.test: npm run test-contracts && npm run test-shared
scripts.deploy-testnet: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network polygon-mumbai
scripts.deploy-mainnet: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network polygon

author: Manus AI
